name: City Runner 3D
description:
Play the most EXCITING RUNNER game on the Appstore. Be the Boss for a day and RACE through the city!

Run, jump around tons of different and STATIC obstacles in this crazy new running game!.
Chase your dream distance...! Set high score and challenge the world.

- Run and maneuver the deadly hurdles with your quick reflexes
- Swipe to ESCAPE from obstacles
- JUMP to avoid blocks
- RACE as fast as possible!
- Very EASY CONTROLS (swipe and touch Screen)
- You must be really quick to save yourselves by jumping through two deadly obstacles


FEATURES

• Trendy approach for running game play
• Endless racing challenge.
